summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons inmate housing record for Jeffrey Epstein, detailing his cell assignments and movements within the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York from July 6, 2019, to August 10, 2019. The document shows he was frequently moved between different housing units and cells.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the inmate housing record, showing his cell assignments and movements within the Metropolitan Correctional Center New York.

events.title: Epstein's Initial Housing Assignment
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was assigned to HOUSE R/RANGE 01/BED 001L at the Metropolitan Correctional Center New York.

events.title: Transfer to Special Housing Unit
events.description: Epstein was moved to HOUSE H/RANGE 01/BED 001L, which appears to be a special housing unit (often used for protective custody or administrative segregation).

events.title: Final Recorded Housing Assignment
events.description: Epstein's last recorded cell assignment was HOUSE 2/RANGE 04/BED 206L AD before his death four days later.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was housed in the Metropolitan Correctional Center New York under inmate number 76318-054.
The document shows Epstein was frequently moved between different cells and housing units during his incarceration.
Epstein spent time in HOUSE H/RANGE 01/BED 001L, which is typically a special housing unit for protective custody or administrative segregation.
The record ends on August 10, 2019, just four days before Epstein's death on August 14, 2019.
Epstein's final recorded assignment was HOUSE 2/RANGE 04/BED 206L AD from July 29, 2019, to August 10, 2019.
